resources.string: add and delete files on device\'s internal storage
used to provide services such as latitude and longitude

During use, in order to provide you with more features, we may apply for Root/Su permission from you. You can go to Permission Management at any time to adjust the authorization status of all permissions, and please go to your Root/Su manager for Root/Su permissions.

Welcome to HyperCeiler. This application relies on the Xposed framework to run. You can use this application to hijack and modify other supported applications to enhance the system. During use, in order to provide you with more functions, we may apply for Root/Su permissions from you. You can manage it at any time by going to your Root/Su Manager.
Enter a value for the Key
Removing Key failed, may not exist:
Please check the return value type that requires obtaining the Key!
HyperCeiler uses some or all of the following projects, thanks to the developers of these projects for their support (in no particular order)
Thanks to the following contributors for their help in the development of HyperCeiler (in no particular order)
You can support us by donating here

Now you have to manually enable permissions for this option.

The completion functions are as follows:
- The mobile phone can be synchronized with Mi Creation
- The domestic and international versions of Mi Browser can be synchronized at the same time

Note: The first synchronization of Mi Creation must be enabled from the settings of Mi Creation, otherwise it will prompt that the network is unavailable or the system is busy, please try again later

Tip: You can support us by donating in \"About - Support\".
Tip: Want to contact to developer? Telegram@Sevtinge_PM_bot or Bilibili@绀漓丨Sevtinge.
Tip: Want to join the official group? Telegram@hyperceiler or search 247909573 in QQ.
Tip: HyperCeiler = HyperOS + Ceiler, Ceiler = Ceil + er.
Tip: Guess how many more times you have to see this tip again?
Tip: Welcome to follow Github@sevtinge or Bilibili@绀漓丨Sevtinge.
Tip: The ideal Utopia does not exist in reality.
Tip: Sanjiang City tends to collapse.
Tip: Ah, this world is so beautiful… It\'s a pity that this beauty does not belong to Sevtinge.
Tip: I\'ve kept some bugs so you know you\'re using HyperCeiler.
Tip: Do you know? In fact, Tips is all nonsense. (Convinced)
Tip: Do you know? HyperCeiler\'s birthday is on May 1, and Sevtinge\'s birthday is on February 2.
Tip: Sevtinge studied at the School of Information Engineering and Technology of Sanjiang City Campus of Shanhe University.
Tip: I heard that Sevtinge has two different forms.
Tip: Sevtinge is a little fox! (Cross out)
Tip: Neko Qiqi has two personalities, one is a cat girl control, and the other is a loli control (x
Tip: HyperCeiler is the fastest battery draining system app (grumpy speech)
Tip: If there is no special annotation for the function that turns gray, it means that the function is abnormal, and it is not planned to be opened to users for the time being
Tip: Don’t chase the new version of Canary if you have nothing to do, and don’t rush to update if it’s broken (
